hero.title: Sarak Par Phans Gaye Hain?
hero.titleHighlight: Fikar Na Karein, Hum Sath Hain.
hero.subtitle: Flat tire, dead battery, ya khali tank — madad sirf ek tap ki doori par hai.

loader.text: Aapka tajarba tayyar ho raha hai...

auth.haveAccount: Kya aapka pehle se account hai?
auth.welcomeSubtitle: Fauri madad ki darkhwast ke liye log in karein ya apne active rescue missions ko manage karein.
auth.joinDescription: Fauri road madad haasil karne ke liye account banayein ya doosron ki madad kar ke paise kamayein.
auth.legalAgreement: Account bana kar, aap hamari Terms of Service aur Privacy Policy se ittefaq karte hain.

requestHelp.title: Aapko kis cheez ki zaroorat hai?
requestHelp.detecting: Aapki location dhoondi ja rahi hai...
requestHelp.searching: Qareebi helpers ko dhoonda ja raha hai...
